sentences.en: A pretty young girl came hurtling down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 一个漂亮的小姑娘飞奔下楼。

sentences.en: All of a sudden, a car came hurtling round the corner.
sentences.cn: 突然，一辆汽车从拐角处冲了出来。

sentences.en: But the players don't use skate, they use bobsled and hurtle down twisting course.
sentences.cn: 但运动员不是穿冰鞋, 而是用雪橇,沿着陡坡的弯曲冰道速滑.

sentences.en: Closed the computer, and hurtle to come downstairs.
sentences.cn: 关了电脑, 冲下楼来.

sentences.en: Own large note , hurtle to press etc. machine equipments.
sentences.cn: 拥有大型注塑, 冲压等机械设备.

sentences.en: RACING track hums as miniature cars hurtle round it.
sentences.cn: 微缩的小车在跑道上飞驰,嗡嗡作响.

sentences.en: Then hurtle to clean, walk out, still just as common.
sentences.cn: 然后冲洗干净, 走出去, 依旧一如平常.

sentences.en: There is official intercommunication hurtle , civilians in advance take measures to try to start China - Japan relationship.
sentences.cn: 官方层面的交往受到限制, 于是民间率先开展试探性的破冰.

words.tran_cn: 急飞，猛烈碰撞，猛掷（hurtle的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 呼啸而过， 快速通过； 猛投， 用力投掷
trans.tran_en: If someone or something hurtles somewhere, they move there very quickly, often in a rough or violent way

trans.tran_cn: 猛投，冲向，猛掷，使猛烈冲击
